Features.Title: What I do
Features.Description: Comprehensive service: audit and consulting, UI/UX design, Front-end (Next.js, TypeScript) and Back-end (Node.js, Django) development, API integration, performance and SEO optimization, testing, maintenance, and deployment. Result: a responsive, fast application that is easily findable on search engines.

feature1.title: Web Applications
feature1.text: Development of modern and responsive interfaces with React and Next.js.

feature2.title: High-Performance APIs
feature2.text: Creation of robust REST and GraphQL APIs with Node.js and NestJS.

feature3.title: AI Integration
feature3.text: Integration of AI models and services, including prompt engineering, model deployment, and API integrations (OpenAI, Hugging Face, etc.).

feature4.title: DevOps & Cloud
feature4.text: Deployment with Docker, CI/CD, hosting on AWS and Vercel.
